participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, enjoys helping others and has a passion for cooking.
participant_1.background: I met the love of my life while working at the hospital. I like to make boats on the weekends. I wish that I could be an animal. I enjoy baking and cooking. I do care about my appearance, but it's not my main focus.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Musical and thoughtful, loves to explore new experiences and values education.
participant_2.background: I have two hands, one to hold my book and the other to turn the pages. My weight is not relevant to my job or my training as a welder. I just accepted a job at the elementary school in my hometown. I sometimes drink too much wine when I go on wine tours. I play many instruments.

content.text: I'm doing great! I just accepted a job at the elementary school in my hometown.
That's great! What grade level will you be teaching?
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great. I work in a hospital and I met my husband while working there.
That's funny! I'm not sure if I could ever work in a hospital. I'm not good with blood or gore.
I'm not great with blood either, but I'm used to it now.
That's good. I'm sure you're a great nurse.
Thank you! I try my best.
I'm sure you do. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to bake and cook. I also like to go camping and hiking.
That's cool. I like to play music and go on wine tours.
That's awesome! I used to play the piano, but I don't have time anymore.
That's too bad. I'm glad you have other hobbies to keep you busy.
Me too. I'm sure I'll get back into playing the piano one day.
I'm sure you will. You seem like a very talented person.
Thank you! You're not so bad yourself.
